 # Add exam / paper management and grading
 Labels: enhancement,priority:low

Description
-----------
Add functionality for teachers to create exams or papers, students to submit answers, and teachers to grade/batch grade.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- Models for `Exam`, `Question`, and `Submission` exist.
- Teachers can author exams and set release/close times.
- Students can take exams and submit answers.
- Teachers can grade and publish scores; students can view results.

Tasks
-----
- Implement DB models and API for exam lifecycle.
- Add frontend exam-taking UI and teacher grading UI.
